pullrequest.title: Create an interface-based system api and update current systems to use it.

content.raw:
@nkoenig This is the interfaced-based System API I was working towards.  It uses some of `ignition::plugin`'s mechanisms to query which interfaces each plugin has and adds them to the corresponding update cycle in SimulationRunner.

The only current limitation is that we can't add Systems that are built as part of the same executable, because `ignition::plugin` doesn't support creating a `SpecializedPluginPtr` outside of the shared library loading mechanism.  As a result, I moved the `MockSystem` that we were using for testing into it’s own library.
